member.name: T:XMLAccess.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:XMLAccess.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:XMLAccess.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:XMLAccess.XMLChampionWithSkins2XML
member.summary: Generate a XML-File which stores championID, link to loading screen image (data dragon), link to youtube login screen (for development it will be a path to a local video file) and a attribute which indicates wheter shall be used (data dragon or youtube) For every Champion all skins will be added as childnodes with the same information

member.name: M:XMLAccess.XMLChampionWithSkins2XML.getDataDragonLink(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Get the right DataDragon-Link for the loading screen
